text:
Hi,

I keep getting this error. I have compiled my apache 2.4.3 from source on RedHat 6.3 Enterprise Servers.

I have configured my Virtual Host to port 80, 443.

I am trying to run a non-SSL (HTTP) port on 443, and then present the certificate through Tomcat 7 Server. The certificate is installed over on tomcat 7 Server.

this set up is working in one of the environments but not in the other two. I have gone through all the configurations and made sure, they are exactly the same. Still i keep getting this error.

Env A - Working
Env B - Not Working
Env C - Not working.

When i compiled from the source code, i did not realize that the openssl-devel package was missing in ENV A, and that MOD_SSL compilation has failed, but when i set up the port 443, for this environment it was working.

I made sure, i replicate it for other environments as well... but without any success.

Can somebody please point me in the right direction ? Could it be a firewall related issue?

Many Thanks in advance.
creator: siddhubp@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text: No logs, configuration, or details about the request -- what's the bug?
